channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk reportedly fires Tesla’s top sales exec
item.description: Omead Afshar, one of Musk's top lieutenants, is out after more than seven years at the company. He was recently elevated to a VP role in late 2024.

item.title: Disney Just Threw a Punch in a Major AI Fight
item.description: On this episode of Uncanny Valley, we explore Disney and Universal's lawsuit against Midjourney, which could be consequential for the future of how in...

item.title: Threads now lets you manage Hidden Words separately from Instagram, set time limits
item.description: Threads, Meta’s competitor to X, now has its own Hidden Words settings that operates separately from Instagram.

item.title: The Trump Phone Is Already a Lot Different From Last Week
item.description: WIRED had many questions last week about the Gold T1 Smartphone. Now we have even more—like where that “made in America” pledge went.

item.title: Uber has Atlanta’s autonomous ride-hailing and delivery market on lock
item.description: Uber Eats customers in Atlanta can now opt in to have their food delivered via sidewalk delivery robots, following partner Serve Robotics’s launch on ...

item.title: Rivian cuts dozens on manufacturing team ahead of R2 launch
item.description: The company laid off around 1% of its total workforce, or around 140 employees. It's the third round of cuts since the start of 2024.

item.title: 5 Best Google Assistant Speakers (2025): Speakers, Displays, Soundbars
item.description: From smart displays to soundbars, Google’s voice assistant comes in all shapes and sizes. Here are our favorites.

item.title: 7 Best Outdoor Lights (2025), Including Solar Lights
item.description: Light up your backyard, porch, patio, or campsite with these WIRED-tested outdoor lights.

item.title: Google Photos merges classic search with AI to speed up results
item.description: The AI feature, first introduced at Google's I/O developer conference last year, allows users to search across their collection of digital photos usin...

item.title: The 8 Best Home Arcade Machines (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Rewind to the classic games of the ‘70s and ‘80s with a WIRED-tested home arcade machine.
